commit.message: Add support for custom gpx width
Add show arrows and show start finish gpx params
Add selected gradient scale type for track
Add track start and finish icons to map layer
Load gpx split type from file
Show track start finish icons by default

nodes.bodyText: Introduce new constructor public GpxDataItem(File file, GPXFile gpx) and drop all these setters.

commit.message: Add constant for default width multiplier
